nodes.text: Lucrenn was a world located within the star system of the same name, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Skine sector. Around the year 10 ABY, it served as the homeworld of Galindas Exports, a fencing operation and member of the criminal Tenloss Syndicate.

Lucrenn was mentioned in the 1994 sourcebook Galaxy Guide 11: Criminal Organizations, written by Rick D. Stuart for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Lucrenn system, and therefore the world Lucrenn, in grid square Q-19.
